subject: Ultra x vs plus x
description_text:
Dear,
What is the difference between ultra x and plus x padels?

Regards
Ibrahim

conversations.body_text: Hi Ibrahim Albrahim,   The main differences between PlusX and ProX Ultra lie in sampling precision and control method: PlusX uses 12-bit resolution with polling sampling, while ProX Ultra offers 16-bit resolution with synchronous sampling, supports 8 levels of hydraulic damping adjustment, and includes RGB lighting, providing faster response, higher precision, and enhanced visual feedback.Â
